div.data-name: Skillman Riga Declaration is out: Shaping the Future of Global Education and Skills Development

article.class: post post-63847 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-news category-672 description-off

img.class: preload-me iso-lazy-load aspect height-ready lazy-load thumb-lazy-load-show is-loaded
img.title: Screenshot 2023-12-13 122313

a.title: Skillman Riga Declaration is out: Shaping the Future of Global Education and Skills Development

h3.a: Skillman Riga Declaration is out: Shaping the Future of Global Education and Skills Development

div.p: The Skillman Declaration stands as the culmination of a number of deliberations and insights garnered from a continuum of events, and echoing collective voices of the previous edition of the Skillman International Forum, The Skillman Alliance Summit, various workshops conducted this year and the Skillman International Forum 2023. This monumental declaration, a testament to collaborative…

a.aria-label: Read more about Skillman Riga Declaration is out: Shaping the Future of Global Education and Skills Development

h3.a: 20th Annual International Scientific Conference on Social Innovations for Sustainable Regional Development

a.title: View all posts by Alessandro Martella

div.p: Klaipeda, Lituania, April 25-26 2024 Call for workshops and call for panels For the 20th Annual International Scientific Conference on Social Innovations for Sustainable Regional Development, set to take place in Klaipeda, Lithuania, on April 25-26, 2024, the Klaipeda University is launching a call for workshop and a call for panels. The two main themes…

div.data-name: D-ChallengHE Call for Papers: Digital Pedagogy in Higher Education

article.class: post post-63834 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-news category-672 description-off

img.class: preload-me iso-lazy-load aspect height-ready lazy-load thumb-lazy-load-show
img.title: d-challenge

a.title: D-ChallengHE Call for Papers: Digital Pedagogy in Higher Education

h3.a: D-ChallengHE Call for Papers: Digital Pedagogy in Higher Education

div.p: As part of the D-challengHE project, the Institute of Education in Romania is excited to announce the call for papers for the 3rd volume (No. 1/ 2024) of its Journal of Digital Pedagogy, welcoming works related to the following thematic areas: The digitalisation of curriculum in higher education; Pedagogical and psychological research on online and…

a.aria-label: Read more about D-ChallengHE Call for Papers: Digital Pedagogy in Higher Education

article.class: post post-63802 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-news category-672 description-off

img.class: preload-me iso-lazy-load aspect height-ready lazy-load thumb-lazy-load-show
img.title: Yuriy BALANYUK

a.title: Letter of thanks from Yuriy BALANYUK – SIF 2023

h3.a: Letter of thanks from Yuriy BALANYUK – SIF 2023

div.p: We have received and with great pleasure republish the letter of thanks from Yuriy BALANYUK, Chairperson of National Qualifications Agency of Ukraine, for participating in SIF2023. Skillman International Skillman Leader Giovanni Crisona On behalf of National Qualifications Agency and mysell I would like to express my sincere gratitude for the invitation to attend…

a.aria-label: Read more about Letter of thanks from Yuriy BALANYUK – SIF 2023

div.data-name: Tereza Khechoyan Participated in Skillman International Forum in Riga

article.class: post post-63794 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-news category-672 description-off

img.class: preload-me iso-lazy-load aspect height-ready lazy-load thumb-lazy-load-show
img.title: kekhoyan

a.title: Tereza Khechoyan Participated in Skillman International Forum in Riga

h3.a: Tereza Khechoyan Participated in Skillman International Forum in Riga

div.p: The European Parliament and Council of the European Union have declared the period May 9, 2023 to May 8, 2024 the European Year of Skills. Tereza Khechoyan, Director for International Cooperation and Development at the Public Administration Academy of RA, is a member of Skillman.eu and attended “The Planet of Skills: Renewed Prospective on Networking…

a.aria-label: Read more about Tereza Khechoyan Participated in Skillman International Forum in Riga

div.data-name: Interview with Mr. Holger Schmidt, ITECH Technical College in Hamburg

article.class: post post-63775 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-interviews category-news category-12 category-672 description-off

img.class: preload-me iso-lazy-load aspect height-ready lazy-load thumb-lazy-load-show

a.title: Interview with Mr. Holger Schmidt, ITECH Technical College in Hamburg

h3.a: Interview with Mr. Holger Schmidt, ITECH Technical College in Hamburg

div.p: According to the framework of SIF2023, Skillman supports the development and exchange of solutions for future challenges in vocational education and training. One important area is the question of how new skills requirements of the labour market can be met through innovative approaches in training. The interview with Mr. Holger Schmidt, head of the department…

a.aria-label: Read more about Interview with Mr. Holger Schmidt, ITECH Technical College in Hamburg

div.data-name: ECHOLE Project: E-learning in the European Higher Education Area

article.class: post post-63738 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-news category-672 description-off

img.class: preload-me iso-lazy-load aspect height-ready lazy-load thumb-lazy-load-show
img.title: copertina_echole

a.title: ECHOLE Project: E-learning in the European Higher Education Area

h3.a: ECHOLE Project: E-learning in the European Higher Education Area

div.p: ECOLHE (E-learning in the European Higher Educengation Area) is a project co-financed by the Erasmus+ Programme of the European Union (project n. 2020-1-IT02-KA203-079176), in the field of KA203 – Strategic Partnerships for higher education, The project started on 1 September 2020 will end on 31 August 2023. The ECOLHE project aimed to examine how the…

a.aria-label: Read more about ECHOLE Project: E-learning in the European Higher Education Area

h3.a: H2020-Auroral Project: Pre-Call for applications AND experts for evaluation

div.p: The H2020-AURORAL Project focuses on increasing connectivity and delivering a digital environment of smart objects, interoperable services, platforms that are able to trigger dynamic #regional including #rural ecosystems of #innovation chains, applications, and services. #AURORAL organises its Open Call to validate and add value the project’s technology and use cases that contributes to creating an…

article.class: post post-63769 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-conferences category-news tag-2023-china-international-fair-for-trade-in-service tag-ciftis category-762 category-672 description-off

h3.a: Giovanni Crisonà @ 2023 China International Fair For Trade In Services

div.p: Dr. Giovanni Crisonà, the Chairman of Skillman.eu gave a speech at China International Fair For Trade In Service (CIFTIS), which was held from September 2 to September 6 2023 in Beijing. CIFTIS is the largest comprehensive exhibition in the field of global trade in services and the leading exhibition in the field of trade in…

img.title: SWOST WEBINAR 11 SETT -cover1

a.title: SWOST WEBINAR: THE TWILIGHT OF THE STEREOTYPES

h3.a: SWOST WEBINAR: THE TWILIGHT OF THE STEREOTYPES

div.p: The Twilight of the StereotypesListen to some female voices who are proactively promoting human rights, values, non-discrimination, equity and social inclusion. In the realm of sports, there is a quiet revolution underway. It’s a revolution that challenges age-old stereotypes, shatters preconceived notions, and paves the way for a more inclusive and equitable sporting world. We…

a.aria-label: Read more about SWOST WEBINAR: THE TWILIGHT OF THE STEREOTYPES

div.data-name: Skillman.eu delegation visits China to strengthen cooperation in vocational education and training

article.class: post post-63674 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-conferences category-news tag-conference tag-educationplus2023 tag-high-level-meeting category-762 category-672 description-off

img.class: preload-me iso-lazy-load aspect height-ready lazy-load thumb-lazy-load-show
img.title: WENN3520-min

a.title: Skillman.eu delegation visits China to strengthen cooperation in vocational education and training

h3.a: Skillman.eu delegation visits China to strengthen cooperation in vocational education and training

div.p: A delegation from Skillman.eu, led by Chairman Giovanni Crisonà, recently visited China to strengthen cooperation in vocational education and training. The delegation met with government officials, industry leaders, and educators from across China to discuss ways to improve the quality and relevance of vocational education and training in both Europe and China. The delegation’s…

a.aria-label: Read more about Skillman.eu delegation visits China to strengthen cooperation in vocational education and training

div.data-name: Meeting at Guangdong Construction Polytechnic

article.class: post post-63604 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-news tag-china tag-crafts tag-guangdong-construction-polytechnic tag-meeting tag-skills tag-tracks4crafts category-672 description-off

img.class: preload-me iso-lazy-load aspect height-ready lazy-load thumb-lazy-load-show

h3.a: Meeting at Guangdong Construction Polytechnic

div.p: On August 21, 2023, an esteemed delegation consisting of Giovanni Crisonà, President, and Torsten Kietz, Senior Advisor of Skillman.eu, alongside Cloud Bayun from UK Naric and other distinguished members, convened in Guangdong, China. The purpose of this gathering was to engage with Pengfei Zhao, President of Guangdong Construction Polytechnic, as well as several managers and educators. The primary focus…

a.aria-label: Read more about Meeting at Guangdong Construction Polytechnic

div.data-name: Meeting at Hangzhou Vocational & Technical College

a.title: Meeting at Hangzhou Vocational & Technical College

h3.a: Meeting at Hangzhou Vocational & Technical College

div.p: On August 19, 2023, Giovanni Crisona, Chairman of Skillman, and Torsten Kietz, Senior Advisor of Skillman, together with Cloud Bayun, Chief Advisor of UK ENIC, and other members of an European delegation, met with Lou Xiaochun, Vice President of Hangzhou Vocational & Technical College, Fu Wenjun, Deputy Secretary of the General Party Branch, Gu Lingang,…

div.data-name: Skillman.eu and Link Campus University Establish Collaboration!

article.class: post post-63421 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-news category-672 description-off

a.title: Skillman.eu and Link Campus University Establish Collaboration!

h3.a: Skillman.eu and Link Campus University Establish Collaboration!

div.p: 📢 We are thrilled to announce that Skillman.eu has entered into a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) with Link Campus University. This collaboration aims to promote innovative solutions in education and skills, fostering growth and effectiveness in the sector. Skillman.eu, represented by Mr. Giovanni Crisonà, President of CSCS, and Link Campus University, represented by Roberto Russo, General Manager,…

div.p: David Tsiskaridze, representing the International Business and Economic Development Centre (IBEDC) in Georgia, recently visited the Skillman Secretariat hosted by Centro Studi Cultura Sviluppo (CSCS) in Pistoia, Tuscany, Italy. The visit aimed to facilitate knowledge exchange and strengthen partnerships between the organisations. Here are the key highlights of David’s onsite experiences: Exchange of Best…

div.p: We are pleased to announce the upcoming Final Conference of the swost.eu (Sport Without Stereotypes) Project, which will be held in parallel and within the esteemed Skillman International Forum 2023 (SIF) in Riga, Latvia. Organised by the Ministry of Education and Science, this conference will take place on the 26th and 27th of September 2023.…

div.data-name: SWOST - INTERNATIONAL WORKSHOP ON GENDER EQUALITY IN SPORT

article.class: post post-61065 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-events category-news category-webin category-webinars category-11 category-672 category-555 category-761 description-off

img.class: preload-me iso-lazy-load aspect height-ready lazy-load thumb-lazy-load-show
img.title: logo swost

a.title: SWOST – INTERNATIONAL WORKSHOP ON GENDER EQUALITY IN SPORT

h3.a: SWOST – INTERNATIONAL WORKSHOP ON GENDER EQUALITY IN SPORT

div.p:
The SWOST team and the Skillman network are glad to invite you to attend the workshop on gender equality in sport.
SWOST – Sport without stereotypes – is an Erasmus+ KA2 project aimed at changing Europe’s sport organisations through the challenge of gender stereotyping within sport organizations. The project addresses in particular a cross-sectorial cooperation, allowing for greater synergies across all fields of actions concerning sport organizations, with a special focus on access to rights, autonomy, participation.

a.aria-label: Read more about SWOST – INTERNATIONAL WORKSHOP ON GENDER EQUALITY IN SPORT

div.p: We are proud to announce that the Skillman Board Member Massimo Temussi, Director General of the Regional Planning Center, was just nominated Counselor of the Italian Ministry of Labour Marina Calderone. div.data-name: Skillman at the Ministry of Education and Science of Latvia

article.class: post post-60747 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-news category-672 description-off

img.class: preload-me iso-lazy-load aspect height-ready lazy-load thumb-lazy-load-show
img.title: group_pic@ministry_of_edu_latvia

a.title: Skillman at the Ministry of Education and Science of Latvia

h3.a: Skillman at the Ministry of Education and Science of Latvia

div.p: On 26 January 2023 in Riga, Latvia, Skillman, represented by Giovanni Crisonà and Valentina De Vico, held an official meeting at the Ministry of Education and Science to discuss and plan future cooperation synergies. Also present at the meeting was Ilze Brante, director of the Ogre Technical School, a modern and innovative vocational training institute located in Ogre, Latvia, 40 km from the capital Riga.

a.aria-label: Read more about Skillman at the Ministry of Education and Science of Latvia

div.data-name: ENTREPRENEURS MOBILITY

article.class: post post-60124 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-news category-672 description-off

img.class: preload-me iso-lazy-load aspect height-ready lazy-load thumb-lazy-load-show
img.title: pexels-fauxels-3184286

h3.a: ENTREPRENEURS MOBILITY

div.p: Skillman.eu offers its members the opportunity to benefit from the EYE – Erasmus for Young Entrepreneurs programme thanks to the agreement and cooperation with the consortium EM Entrepreneurs Mobility.
Erasmus for Young Entrepreneurs is the programme launched by the EU to provide promising European entrepreneurs with the necessary skills to start and/or successfully run a small business in Europe.
The EM Consortium consists of ten international organisations responsible for distributing the EYE grants.
